author: dantraMSFT
body:
PSSessionConfiguration.Tests.ps1 contains tests that compare Session.PSVersion to a  hard coded version string. These tests break when the next release version doesn't match the string.

Update the test to rely on PSVersionTable.PSVersion instead of the hard code value.

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: This PR duplicates what is being done in #5554

title: Remove hard coded expected version string
